name: KMC Solutions, Inc.
description: Founded by Gregory Kittelson, Michael McCullough, and Amanda Carpo KMC has a young and talented management team from a range of disciplines and expertise. KMC's leadership team is paving the way for the future of flexible workspace and offshoring in the Philippines. We create experiences and environments that foster connections which results in impactful game-changing opportunities for everyone. We are committed to providing premium office spaces and high-performing offshore teams for both Filipino and Multinational companies. KMC started out with only 2 floors in a single building, now we have the largest collection of proworking spaces in the Philippines with 67 floors across 20+ buildings. We are proud to be trusted by some of the most innovative startups & partners and established global brands when it comes to doing business in the Philippines.

Highlights.name: Coworking Space Provider in the Philippines
Highlights.description: KMC Solutions is a company that provides office spaces in the Philippines. They offer private offices and coworking spaces for rent.

Highlights.name: Multiple Locations
Highlights.description: The company has locations throughout Metro Manila, Cebu and Clark, catering to a wide range of areas. They claim to have the largest collection of coworking spaces in the Philippines.

Highlights.name: Amenities and Services
Highlights.description: In addition to office space, KMC offers access to meeting rooms, pantries, and business development opportunities, aiming to provide a comprehensive solution for businesses.

enhanced_description: KMC Solutions, Inc. is a leading provider of flexible workspace solutions and Employer of Record (EOR) services in the Philippines. Starting from 2 floors in a single building, KMC has grown to offer the largest collection of proworking spaces in the Philippines, spanning 67 floors across more than 20 buildings in key locations like Metro Manila, Cebu, and Clark. Beyond premium private offices and coworking spaces, KMC supports businesses with comprehensive HR and staffing services, including recruitment, selection, and deployment of high-performing offshore teams. Their services also extend to critical HR administration such as termination and redundancy control, and managing government-mandated remittances and reports. This integrated approach aims to facilitate the overall business setup process in the Philippines, enabling both Filipino and Multinational companies to establish operations and fill open positions more quickly.
